name: BraPlanet
description:
Decorate your planet with anything! A bra for example : )

It was made out of some jokes, by a bunch of goofy girls.

We hope you like it :3

------------------ control ----------------------

Summon: Aim at something with the lasers and pull Trigger (Interact) to bring them forward.

Grab & throw: grab an object to place it on the planet, or throw it away :)

Move Planet: Grab the white planet to move it around.

Teleport: Thumb pad (or whatever it is for Teleport?) will teleport you within the glass floor.
